scene-graph-node-header.out-of-timeframe-tooltip: This node is hidden because the current time is outside its specified time frame. It will not be visible even if enabled.

delete-button.cannot-delete-current-focus: Cannot delete the current focus node
delete-button.info: Remove this scene graph node (and all its child nodes) from the scene

delete-confirm-modal.title: Delete node
delete-confirm-modal.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to remove the scene graph node
delete-confirm-modal.this-is-irreversible: This action is irreversible and will also remove all nodes in the scene tree that depend on this node!

scene-graph-node-view.not-found-info: This scene graph node does not exist. It might have been removed since this view was opened.

renderable.title: Renderable
renderable.tooltip: Properties that control the visuals of this object
renderable.no-renderable: This scene graph node has no renderable

transform.title: Transform
transform.tooltip: Properties that control the position, scale, and orientation of this object
transform.no-transform: This scene graph node has no transform

timeframe.title: Time
timeframe.tooltip: Information about the time frame for which the object is visible

status.label: Current status
status.tooltip-active: This object is currently active and will be visible
status.tooltip-inactive: This object is currently inactive due to its time frame and will not be visible

timeframe.info: The object will not be visible outside the specified time range.

info.title: Info
info.tooltip: Information about the scene graph node and its asset

other.title: Other
other.tooltip: Other properties of this scene graph node

scene-tree-filters.settings-tooltip: Additional settings to filter search results

show-only-visible.label: Show only visible
show-only-visible.info: Show only nodes that are currently visible, meaning enabled and not faded out.

show-only-focusable.label: Show only focusable
show-only-focusable.info: Hide scene graph nodes that are not markes as focusable, meaning that they cannot be directly set as the focus node in the scene.

show-gui-hidden.label: Show objects with GUI hidden flag
show-gui-hidden.info: Show scene graph nodes that are marked as hidden in the GUI part of the asset. These are otherwise hidden in the interface.
